get.description:
Fetch all applications.

    Supports filtering by one or more attributes:
    - ?email=my@email.com
    - ?email=my@email.com&name=flex
Fetch a single application by name

Fetch all projects.

    Support filtering by one or more attributes:
    - ?name=projectName
    - ?email=my@email.com

Search for projects given one or more attributes.

- /search?q=ProjectName
- /search?q=ApplicationName
